data.title: Dina Merrill
data.meta_description: Dina Merrill was born into one of the richest families in America and lived in a mansion on the Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida that is now owned by President Trum
data.text:
Dina Merrill was born into one of the richest families in America and lived in a mansion on the Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida that is now owned by President Trump, except in the summer months, when she was on the family’s yacht, hanging out with the Duke and Duchess of Windsor and their like.

Her father was the legendary financier EF Hutton, who had his daughter’s life planned out for her, starting with law school. Merrill, though, did not really fancy it. She felt uncomfortable and lonely surrounded by wealth and privilege. “It was never my scene,” she said. She envied classmates who began their day with the chatter of the school bus, when she had only the family chauffeur for company.

By her mid-teens
